item.description:
Let's go check out how these fine products are made.

Ryan & Wood, Inc. Distilleries is please to call Gloucester its home, turning Cape Ann into the birth place of an array of top shelf spirits. Steeped in history and tradition, Gloucester is quintessential New England, from which inspiration is drawn. Family owned and operated, they are committed to providing best-of-class products to hard working local and world travelers alike, crafting world class spirits on historic Cape Ann Ryan & Wood are the makers of Beauport Vodka, Folly Cove Rum and Knockabout Gin.

Please note: The tour will start at 1:00pm, the meetup time is at 12:45.

Game plan: We will take a tour of their plant and learn the process of how they make their products, they will answer any questions that you may have. Even if you aren’t a big drinker come out anyways and learn something new.

Parking: In their parking lot.

Cost: FREE.  This is an over 21 event!

Time: The tour will take an hour depending on how many questions are asked.

Where to Meetup: Inside the entrance.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone: 978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues? Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event. Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Look forward to seeing you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be outside in front of the entrance.
item.name: Come take a tour of Ryan & Wood Distilleries!
